SQL.LOAD: SELECT invoice_id, claim_authorization_id, line_item_number, vendor_sku, vendor_sku_description, amount, adjustment_reason_id, service_class_id, service_type_id, service_level_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, invoice_item_id FROM elp_invoice_item WHERE invoice_item_id = hextoraw(:invoice_item_id)
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT invoice_id, claim_authorization_id, line_item_number, vendor_sku, vendor_sku_description, amount, adjustment_reason_id, service_class_id, service_type_id, service_level_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, invoice_item_id FROM elp_invoice_item WHERE invoice_id = hextoraw(:invoice_id)
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_invoice_item SET invoice_id = :invoice_id, claim_authorization_id = :claim_authorization_id, line_item_number = :line_item_number, vendor_sku = :vendor_sku, vendor_sku_description = :vendor_sku_description, amount = :amount, adjustment_reason_id = :adjustment_reason_id, service_class_id = :service_class_id, service_type_id = :service_type_id, service_level_id = :service_level_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE invoice_item_id = hextoraw(:invoice_item_id)
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_invoice_item ( invoice_id, claim_authorization_id, line_item_number, vendor_sku, vendor_sku_description, amount, adjustment_reason_id, service_class_id, service_type_id, service_level_id, created_by, invoice_item_id ) VALUES ( :invoice_id, :claim_authorization_id, :line_item_number, :vendor_sku, :vendor_sku_description, :amount, :adjustment_reason_id, :service_class_id, :service_type_id, :service_level_id, :created_by, :invoice_item_id )
SQL.DELETE: DELETE FROM elp_invoice_item WHERE invoice_item_id = hextoraw(:invoice_item_id)
